name: Learning The Human
description:
LEARNING THE HUMAN

We are Savvy, a team of 4 people who want to explore new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

This time, our theme was NON-VERBAL COMMUNICATION. aaand we also decided to join the Ludum Dare #45 late and use their "Start With Nothing" as an additional theme!

In our game you play an alien landing on earth, and you have to communicate with the folks around in order to be friends.

"Learning the Human" is a game about communication, except you will not be using a single word. You'll have to make do with only emoticons! (:

ENJOY, and give us feedback!

Made with love by special guest Juliette Pereira, Delphin Casado, Tom Rivière, Frédéric Urien and the gentle distant smile of Lola El Koubi.
